page.topic: Tabbed linked grids with codeless Ajax
page.description: Alpha Anywhere Version 10 makes it possible to create powerful "master-detail" grids by placing "linked content sections" on the grid. If a linked content section contains more than one grid, the content is displayed in a tab or accordion object.

description.p: For example, say you have a customer grid that displays the orders for the customer record that has focus. The orders grid, in turn, might display the order details for the order that has focus. There is no limit to the level of nesting of linked content.
